message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the product at a special price of $120. I think you'll really love it!
Thanks for the offer, Alice, but that's a little steep for me.  Would you consider $90?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. I can do $110, but I'm not sure I can go any lower than that.
I understand, Alice.  I could meet you halfway at $100.  That's about as high as I can go.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Bob. I can do $105, but I'm not sure I can go any higher than that.
